title: 13: No Such Thing As A Funny Nazi
content: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm) Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) & special guest Lieven Scheire (@Lievenscheire) discuss Disney's war effort, the rules of pillow fighting, stoned dolphins and more...
